subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With the score tied, 1-1, in the third period, Vernon Fiddler’s shot banked off the skate of Devils defenseman Mark Fayne and past Devils goalie Johan Hedberg.
snippet: With the score tied, 1-1, in the third period, Vernon Fiddler’s shot banked off the skate of Devils defenseman Mark Fayne and past Devils goalie Johan Hedberg.
